name: The Goat Man II
description:
A shadow looms over you. In the darkness, you find yourself pitted against a slew of horrific creatures. Equipped with your lucky dice, roll your way to victory or defeat. Triumph over monsters, receive aid from unlikely allies and rise from the oppressive shadow of the dreaded Goat Man.

Tutorial:

On the map, click on one of the icons to proceed to an event.

  • Sword - A battle encounter.
  • Anvil - Upgrade either your attack or defense dice
  • Cauldron - Upgrade either your utility or modifier dice
  • Fountain - Heal your HP to full
  • Question Mark - Find a fountain or a battle 

 Battle:

  • Select up to 3 dice to add to your cup, and click roll. 
  • Dice have different effects, you can click the Info icon next to them to see what is on each face of your dice:
    • Red Die - Deals damage to the enemy
    • Blue Die - Defends you against enemy damage
    • Green Die - Chance to stun the enemy and skip their turn
    • Yellow die  - Modifies the damage of your red die
  • Winning a fight awards you with +2 max HP

Thank you for playing our game! This is the first game we've ever made and we're excited for you to play it. There are a lot of things we are still working on, improving, and implementing. Please let us know if you have any feedback.
